Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding the movie 'Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara' released in 2011?
Options:
A. The movie was originally titled 'Running with the Bulls'.
B. The final title of the movie is 'Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara'.
C. The film was released in 2010.
D. The title 'Running with the Bulls' was used as a working title before finalizing.
Answer: The movie was originally titled 'Running with the Bulls', The final title of the movie is 'Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara', The title 'Running with the Bulls' was used as a working title before finalizing.

B. They worked independently without collaboration.

Answer: Imran was developed specifically for Farhan Akhtar., Farhan Akhtar played the role of Imran in the film., The script was written by Zoya Akhtar and Reema Kagti.
